    @UnstableApi
public static interface RecvByteBufAllocator.ExtendedHandle
extends RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean continueReading(UncheckedBooleanSupplier maybeMoreDataSupplier)
      Same as RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle.continueReading() except "more data" is determined by the supplier parameter.

        allocate, attemptedBytesRead, attemptedBytesRead, continueReading, guess, incMessagesRead, lastBytesRead, lastBytesRead, readComplete, reset

    • 方法详细资料

      • continueReading

        boolean continueReading(UncheckedBooleanSupplier maybeMoreDataSupplier)
        Same as RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle.continueReading() except "more data" is determined by the supplier parameter.
        参数:
        maybeMoreDataSupplier - A supplier that determines if there maybe more data to read.
